item.alchemy.aluminum_can.desc: A lightweight can perfect for storing brewed beverages.
item.alchemy.aluminum_can.flavor_text: Keeps your drink fresh and portable, whether you're exploring caves or climbing mountains.
item.alchemy.aluminum_can.crafting_instr: Crafted using Aluminum Ingots at a Crafting Table.
item.alchemy.aluminum_keg.desc: A sturdy keg made of aluminum, ideal for storing large quantities of brewed beverages.
item.alchemy.aluminum_keg.tooltip: Used to contain large amounts of brewed drinks.
item.alchemy.aluminum_keg.flavor_text: Perfect for parties or long journeys, this keg keeps your brew safe and ready to serve.
item.alchemy.aluminum_keg.crafting_instr: Crafted using Aluminum Ingots and Iron Bars at a Crafting Table.
item.alchemy.coppercap_lager.desc: A crisp lager with a faint metallic bite and a clean finish.
item.alchemy.coppercap_lager.flavor_text: A miner’s reward after a long shift—sharp, steady, and strangely energizing.
item.alchemy.coppercap_lager.warning: Warning: Excessive consumption may cause Nausea.
item.alchemy.coppercap_lager.crafting_in: To brew Coppercap Lager, place the ingredients into a Fermenting Barrel and wait for the brew time to complete.
item.alchemy.frostmarsh_pils.desc: An icy pilsner that snaps cold on the tongue, even at room temperature.
item.alchemy.frostmarsh_pils.flavor_text: Brewed in the tundra air—one sip feels like a sprint across fresh snow.
item.alchemy.frostmarsh_pils.warning: Warning: Excessive consumption may cause Slowness once it wears off.
item.alchemy.frostmarsh_pils.crafting_in: To brew Frostmarsh Pils, place the ingredients into a Fermenting Barrel and wait for the brew time to complete.
item.alchemy.emberhold_amber_ale.desc: A warm amber ale with toasted notes and a smoky aftertaste.
item.alchemy.emberhold_amber_ale.ingredi: Ingredients: Water, Barley, Roasted Barley, Blaze Powder
item.alchemy.emberhold_amber_ale.flavor_: Popular near forges and lavafalls—keeps courage high and burns low.
item.alchemy.emberhold_amber_ale.warning: Warning: Excessive consumption may cause Weakness.
item.alchemy.emberhold_amber_ale.craftin: To brew Emberhold Amber Ale, place the ingredients into a Fermenting Barrel and wait for the brew time to complete.
item.alchemy.sunvale_golden_pale.desc: A bright pale ale with a honeyed sparkle and orchard-fresh aroma.
item.alchemy.sunvale_golden_pale.ingredi: Ingredients: Water, Wheat, Hops, Honey Bottle
item.alchemy.sunvale_golden_pale.flavor_: Bottled midsummer in a can—light enough for work, lively enough for song.
item.alchemy.sunvale_golden_pale.warning: Warning: Excessive consumption may cause Nausea.
item.alchemy.sunvale_golden_pale.craftin: To brew Sunvale Golden Pale, place the ingredients into a Fermenting Barrel and wait for the brew time to complete.
item.alchemy.stormwake_session_ipa.desc: A sharp, citrusy IPA with a crackle of sea-salt bitterness.
item.alchemy.stormwake_session_ipa.flavo: Dockside favorite—made for fast hands, rough weather, and quick escapes.
item.alchemy.stormwake_session_ipa.warni: Warning: Excessive consumption may cause Mining Fatigue.
item.alchemy.stormwake_session_ipa.craft: To brew Stormwake Session IPA, place the ingredients into a Fermenting Barrel and wait for the brew time to complete.
item.alchemy.blackvault_stout.desc: A heavy stout as dark as obsidian, thick enough to count as a meal.
item.alchemy.blackvault_stout.ingredient: Ingredients: Water, Roasted Barley, Cocoa Beans, Hops
item.alchemy.blackvault_stout.flavor_tex: Pulled from cellar-cold stone—one can and the world feels less dangerous.
item.alchemy.blackvault_stout.warning: Warning: Excessive consumption may cause Slowness.
item.alchemy.blackvault_stout.crafting_i: To brew Blackvault Stout, place the ingredients into a Fermenting Barrel and wait for the brew time to complete.
item.alchemy.thornveil_herbal_ale.desc: A herbal ale with a sweet start and a thorny, medicinal finish.
item.alchemy.thornveil_herbal_ale.ingred: Ingredients: Water, Wheat, Sweet Berries, Dandelion
item.alchemy.thornveil_herbal_ale.flavor: A hedge-brewer’s remedy—comforting, fragrant, and slightly suspicious.
item.alchemy.thornveil_herbal_ale.warnin: Warning: Excessive consumption may cause Poison.
item.alchemy.thornveil_herbal_ale.crafti: To brew Thornveil Herbal Ale, place the ingredients into a Fermenting Barrel and wait for the brew time to complete.
item.alchemy.ropesend_dockside_brew.desc: A simple, fizzy dockside brew that goes down easy and hits fast.
item.alchemy.ropesend_dockside_brew.flav: Brewed for sailors and scavengers—cheap, cheerful, and oddly fortunate.
item.alchemy.ropesend_dockside_brew.warn: Warning: Excessive consumption may cause Nausea.
item.alchemy.ropesend_dockside_brew.craf: To brew Ropesend Dockside Brew, place the ingredients into a Fermenting Barrel and wait for the brew time to complete.
item.alchemy.chorus_bloom_gin.desc: A botanical gin infused with chorus blossoms—floral, ethereal, and slightly teleporty.
item.alchemy.chorus_bloom_gin.tooltip: Use to steady nerves and sharpen senses.
item.alchemy.chorus_bloom_gin.ingredient: Ingredients: Water, Sugar, Chorus Flower, Juniper Berries
item.alchemy.chorus_bloom_gin.flavor_tex: Distilled in the End—each sip feels like a brief step beyond reality.
item.alchemy.chorus_bloom_gin.warning: Warning: Excessive consumption may cause Levitation.
item.alchemy.chorus_bloom_gin.crafting_i: To brew Chorus Bloom Gin, place the ingredients into a Distillation Apparatus and wait for the brew time to complete.
item.alchemy.dune_mirage_rum.desc: A velvety rum distilled under desert moons—warming, smooth, and a little deceptive.
item.alchemy.dune_mirage_rum.tooltip: Use to feel the sands shift in your favor.
item.alchemy.dune_mirage_rum.ingredients: Ingredients: Water, Sugar, Cactus Juice, Spiced Rum Essence
item.alchemy.dune_mirage_rum.flavor_text: Bottled heat from sun-scorched dunes—one sip and the world seems to ripple.
item.alchemy.dune_mirage_rum.warning: Warning: Excessive consumption may cause Invisibility.
item.alchemy.dune_mirage_rum.crafting_in: To brew Dune Mirage Rum, place the ingredients into a Distillation Apparatus and wait for the brew time to complete.
item.alchemy.frostpetal_schnapps.desc: A crisp schnapps with frostbitten petals—icy bright, clean as mountain air.
item.alchemy.frostpetal_schnapps.tooltip: Use to cool the mind and quicken the pulse.
item.alchemy.frostpetal_schnapps.ingredi: Ingredients: Water, Sugar, Frostpetal Flower, Mint Leaves
item.alchemy.frostpetal_schnapps.flavor_: Distilled from flowers that bloom in the coldest heights—each sip feels like a breath of fresh, icy air.
item.alchemy.frostpetal_schnapps.warning: Warning: Excessive consumption may cause Water Breathing.
item.alchemy.frostpetal_schnapps.craftin: To brew Frostpetal Schnapps, place the ingredients into a Distillation Apparatus and wait for the brew time to complete.
item.alchemy.hollowshade_absinthe.desc: An emerald spirit brewed in shadow—bitter, complex, and unsettlingly lucid.
item.alchemy.hollowshade_absinthe.toolti: Use to see patterns others miss.
item.alchemy.hollowshade_absinthe.ingred: Ingredients: Water, Sugar, Wormwood, Anise Seeds
item.alchemy.hollowshade_absinthe.flavor: Crafted in the darkest corners of the forest—one sip and the world sharpens into strange clarity.
item.alchemy.hollowshade_absinthe.warnin: Warning: Excessive consumption may cause Night Vision.
item.alchemy.hollowshade_absinthe.crafti: To brew Hollowshade Absinthe, place the ingredients into a Distillation Apparatus and wait for the brew time to complete.
item.alchemy.scarabgold_brandy.desc: Amber brandy with desert resin—rich, resinous, and royalty-approved.
item.alchemy.scarabgold_brandy.tooltip: Use to embolden speech and steady hands.
item.alchemy.scarabgold_brandy.ingredien: Ingredients: Water, Sugar, Date Syrup, Desert Resin
item.alchemy.scarabgold_brandy.flavor_te: Distilled in sun-baked palaces—each sip feels like a taste of opulence and power.
item.alchemy.scarabgold_brandy.warning: Warning: Excessive consumption may cause Strength.
item.alchemy.scarabgold_brandy.crafting_: To brew Scarabgold Brandy, place the ingredients into a Distillation Apparatus and wait for the brew time to complete.
item.alchemy.soulflame_spirit.desc: A hauntingly bright spirit that glows faintly—sweet heat, long finish.
item.alchemy.soulflame_spirit.effect: Grants Strength and Fire Resistance for 1 minute.
item.alchemy.soulflame_spirit.tooltip: Use to feel a gentle inner fire.
item.alchemy.soulflame_spirit.ingredient: Ingredients: Water, Sugar, Blaze Powder, Honey Bottle
item.alchemy.soulflame_spirit.flavor_tex: Bottled from ethereal flames—one sip and a warm glow spreads within.
item.alchemy.soulflame_spirit.warning: Warning: Excessive consumption may cause Strength and Fire Resistance.
item.alchemy.soulflame_spirit.crafting_i: To brew Soulflame Spirit, place the ingredients into a Distillation Apparatus and wait for the brew time to complete.
